name: Motor Brawl
description:
Motor Brawl is a local multiplayer fighting-party game in which you'll have to take your rivals out of the road using a variety of items and the procedurally generated map in your favor. 

Think quick and act faster. Be the last on the road. Drive them wild!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/EBoogaloo_St 

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz3VLn9YRqTCSep-H--FErg 

G-mail: electricboogaloostudio@gmail.com
